context: Regional retail chain expanding online presence needs to adopt modern e-commerce platform to compete with national competitors

request.justification: Current manual processes limiting online growth, competitors using advanced platforms gaining market share

decision_process.outcome: Defined must-have features: mobile optimization, inventory integration, payment processing
Selected Magento Commerce for flexibility and scalability
Phased implementation over 4 months with go-live in Q3

business_impact.expected_outcome: 25% increase in online revenue, improved customer experience, operational efficiency

lessons_learned: Thorough requirements gathering prevented feature gaps, vendor selection based on long-term fit rather than lowest cost
